Topic.Title: Mainframe Software Maker BMC software Tanking >

Message.Msg: Means nothing to IBM. In case you didn't know ziggy: BMC Software downgraded to Neutral from Outperform at Credit Suisse Credit Suisse has concerns regarding BMC Software's peak margins and its growth profile of its ESM division. Price target lowered to $40 from $45.
